Understate: The claim understates the severity of Covid-19 by comparing it to the flu and suggesting that people can manage it themselves without testing.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or scientific support to back up its assertion that people in PNG should not get tested for Covid-19.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that health officials in PNG will not provide proper care if someone tests positive for Covid-19, without providing evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to consider the alternative explanation that testing for Covid-19 is important for accurate diagnosis and to prevent the spread of the virus, as stated by medical experts.
